1.text: What is the best way of making all images in the slideshow in lab 8 the same size?

answers.a: Crop the edges of the images, cutting off important parts
answers.b: Stretch the images, making them look distorted
answers.c: Frame them is a consistently sized box that makes them as big as possible without either of the above flaws

2.text: What is thing I least deserved to miss points for?

answers.a: In-Class Problem 9/18, where I said our project 1 does not have a build process (which is true)
answers.b: Lab 8 Exercise 3, where I made the images fit using the answer to question 1
answers.c: Project 2 user interface, where a restart game button was not part of the requirements
answers.d: Lab 4, where the amount of activities in the ATM scenerio was below the secret threshold

3.text: What are the chances the grader is reading these?

4.text: What is not part of our project grades?

answers.a: After Project 4 is due (preventing any feedback from being incorporated)
answers.b: Over 3 weeks past its due date
answers.c: Before all of the in-class problems from October
